name: Neon Souls Demo
description:
Neon Souls is a Fast-paced Splatformer where you Paint Invisible Platforms with Neon Ink.

Controls:

Move Left :   A / Left Arrow

Move Right :   D / Right Arrow

Jump:   Space

Double Jump / Spray Ink :   2x Space

*FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT*

This is Just a Demo, but you can Download the Full Version on Steam.
